mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, product_id, quantity, color, size) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{color}, #{size})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.user_id AS userId, c.product_id AS productId, c.quantity, c.color, c.size, p.name, p.main_image1 AS mainImage1, p.price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
